Actions.Name: Wicked Slice
Actions.Effect: Critical hit (+[D]) against bloodied characters. Dash 1 before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is slowed, and must save or take take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn. Slowed foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Danse Macabre
Actions.Description: Target a close blast 2 area. Teleport five times. May deal [D] to an adjacent foe each time. Must choose a different foe each time unless every foe has been targeted at least once by this ability.
